title: CONTINUOUS_EVENT_VARIABLE
description: Dynamically updated variable of any continuous type whose value may change by arbitrarily small amounts. The `_update_variation_` attribute may be used to control updating frequency.
$comments: Defined in Definition IM, inherits from EVENT_VARIABLE

name.description: Name of variable, as used in precondition and decision expressions.

populating_request.description: Optional specification of a system request that would populate a context variable.

update_variation.description: Minimum percentage variation from current value to be considered a change that should cause an update.
